column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Daw says : " Stay back !
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't panic , I 'm just here to talk .
#Text=" Daw says : " Please , I do n't know what I 'm doing and I do n't want to hurt anyone .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tell me about it .
#Text=Rough day , huh ?
#Text=I 'm having kind of a rough day myself .
#Text=You mind if I sit down here ?
#Text=" Daw says : " Huh .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , I know you 're scared .
#Text=You 've gone through a big change and its kind of my fault .
#Text=But you 're not alone , there are other airbenders and they want to help you .
#Text=Actually , they are really excited to meet you .
#Text=" Daw says : " I do n't want to be an airbender .
#Text=Please , you 're the Avatar , make it stop .
#Text=Ahh !
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry , I ca n't , but I promise you things will get better if you just give it a chance .
#Text=Let me take you over to Air Temple Island and we can talk this through .
#Text=Okay ?
#Text=" Daw says : " Oh !
#Text=Ahh !
#Text=" Korra says : " Daw , this is Tenzin .
#Text=He is going to help you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It is absolutely my pleasure to meet you , Daw .
#Text=I have never met a new airbender before .
#Text=Well , at least not one whose diaper I did n't have to change .
#Text=" Daw says : " Actually , I just fell off a bridge so I could use a fresh diaper right about now .
#Text=" Raiko says : " So , is this the deal ?
#Text=We have crisis every other day now thanks to you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Listen , I know you 're having a tough time getting used to these changes and I 'm sorry for that , but you and everyone else are going to have to learn live with it .
#Text=The vines and the spirits are here to stay .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Well , you know who 's not here to stay ?
#Text=You !
#Text=I order you to leave this city .
#Text=You 've caused nothing but trouble since you arrived .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't worry , I was already leaving .
#Text=" Korra says : " I can see my path now .
#Text=There are new airbenders out there and I 'm going to find them and rebuild the Air Nation .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do n't think I 'm not going with you .
#Text=It 's so exciting .
#Text=Who knows who 's out there now , discovering the gift of airbending for the first time ?
#Text="
